article.title: Status and history for hin
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Replaced an erroneous occurrence of U+003A COLON by U+0903 DEVANAGARI SIGN VISARGA, thanks to Sridatta A.
small number of corrections thanks to Zdeneěk Wagner.
many corrections thanks to Zdeneěk Wagner.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
